item.title: “Yikes”: Internal emails reveal Ticketmaster helped scalpers jack up prices
item.description: FTC sued Ticketmaster and Live Nation for turning “blind eye” to scalpers.

item.title: FTC Sues Ticketmaster and Live Nation Over Claims of Unfair Ticket Practices, NIVA and NITO Applaud Move
item.description: The Federal Trade Commission and seven states sued Live Nation and Ticketmaster on Thursday, alleging the companies worked with ticket brokers in the secondary market. The lawsuit claims the companies

item.title: FTC Sues Ticketmaster and Live Nation Over Claims of Unfair Ticket Practices, NIVA and NITO Applaud Move
item.description: The Federal Trade Commission and seven states sued Live Nation and Ticketmaster on Thursday, alleging the companies worked with ticket brokers in the secondary market. The lawsuit claims the companies

item.title: FTC Sues Live Nation and Ticketmaster Over Claims of Coordinating With Ticket Brokers For Ticket Resale
item.description: The FTC claims the conduct “gives purchasing consumers no choice but to resort to purchasing tickets at a steep markup in the resale market.”

item.title: FTC Sues Live Nation and Ticketmaster Over Claims of Coordinating With Ticket Brokers For Ticket Resale
item.description: The FTC claims the conduct “gives purchasing consumers no choice but to resort to purchasing tickets at a steep markup in the resale market.”

item.title: Live Nation Prepares for DOJ Trial, Eyeing Possible Loss of Exclusive Contracts
item.description: A trial is currently scheduled for March 2026.

item.title: Live Nation Prepares for DOJ Trial, Eyeing Possible Loss of Exclusive Contracts
item.description: A trial is currently scheduled for March 2026.

item.title: Live Nation Posts Strong Second Quarter as Revenues Rise to $7 Billion
item.description: “We’re positioned to grow operating income and adjusted operating income by double-digits this year and for years to come,” Live Nation CEO Michael Rapino said in a statement.

item.title: Live Nation Posts Strong Second Quarter as Revenues Rise to $7 Billion
item.description: “We’re positioned to grow operating income and adjusted operating income by double-digits this year and for years to come,” Live Nation CEO Michael Rapino said in a statement.

item.title: Live Nation Hits $7 Billion in Revenue for Second Quarter
